title: Right Here Waiting: A military romance (Ward Sisters Book 3)
features: For over a decade, she carries an undeserved bad reputation. He spends that time becoming the honorable man he’s destined to be.

After high school, Meghan Miles runs away to college far and fast, eager to leave her past behind. But as a successful therapist, she knows she can’t hide forever. At a friend’s wedding full of hometown guests, she faces a turning point—the sexy soldier who keeps landing in her orbit might remind her of those dark teen years on the surface, but underneath, he’s everything she wants. Is he worth the risk?From the moment he first lays eyes on his high school crush, Captain Neil Murphy knows he’ll never have a shot with the most beautiful girl he’s ever seen. Despite years transforming his body from a scrawny, geeky boy into a formidable soldier in the Army, the woman of his dreams still induces his awkwardness each time he encounters her. It’s not until he realizes the attraction is mutual that he’s able to fully be himself. Now, he needs to convince her they’re a perfect match.Fate brings Meghan and Neil together more than once, and it seems destined for them to make a connection. But Neil is about to be deployed to Afghanistan for the next nine months. Can their fledgling romance survive a wartime courtship? If the worst happens, and Neil doesn't make it home in one piece, will Meghan find the strength to trust in destiny and do the right thing?
